response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its exceptional worth and unique features, I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Considering its true value, I am offering this remarkable item to you for $12,000. This price not only ensures you acquire a high-quality asset but also leaves room for negotiation if needed. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
